sentence:
• Shares of Deere & Company ( DE ) plunged 8.1% after the company reported third quarter revenues of $6.84 billion, lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $7.13 billion
• Hewlett-Packard Company's ( HPQ ) shares advanced 0.4% after the company posted third quarter earnings per share of $0.88 that beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.85
• Shares of Ross Stores Inc. ( ROST ) plummeted 9.5% after the company projected earnings per share in the range of $2.40-$2.45 for fiscal 2015, while analysts anticipated earnings to be at the top end of that range
• Shares of salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) gained almost 2% after the company posted second quarter revenues of $1.635 billion, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.599 billion
